(:action break ; Break or alter a security measure to change an object's state
    :parameters (?entity - object ?tool - tool)
    :precondition (and
                    (entity_state ?entity vulnerable)
                    (tool_location ?tool accessible)
                    (tool_condition ?tool operational))
    :effect (and
             (entity_state ?entity altered)
             (tool_location ?tool used)
             (tool_condition ?tool worn))

(:action creating_back_door
       :parameters (?door - object)
       :precondition (and
                       (fridge_door_electric_conductivity ?door off)
                       (fridge_door_openness ?door open))
       :effect (and
                (fridge_door_electric_conductivity ?door on)
                (fridge_door_openness ?door closed))

(:action getting ; Acquire a status or resource by modifying group or individual attributes
  :parameters (?entity - agent ?target - goal)
  :precondition (and (not (acquired ?entity ?target)) (precondition_for ?entity ?target))
  :effect (and (acquired ?entity ?target) (postcondition_for ?entity ?target))

(:action knowing ; Understand and transform the state of a resource
  :parameters (?entity - object ?context - situation)
  :precondition (and
                  (entity_state ?entity ?context)
                  (entity_attention ?entity carelessly_managed))
  :effect (and
           (entity_state ?entity refined_context)
           (entity_attention ?entity carefully_managed))
